mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODNO, U.USERNO,U.UNAME, R.REVIEWNO,R.REVTITLE,R.REVTEXT,R.REVREGDATE,R.REVSCORE FROM REVIEW R JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODNO = R.PRODNO JOIN USERS U ON U.USERNO = R.USERNO WHERE P.PRODNO = #{prodNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW VALUES (seq_reviewno.nextval, #{userNo}, #{prodNo}, #{revTitle}, #{revText}, sysdate, NULL ,#{revScore})
